patthana17.12:1.1: Kusalaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.12:2.1: Kusalaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.12:3.1: Kusalaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
